name: The Stolen Tide (C-Rank)
description:
A shipment of highly volatile alchemical goods has been stolen from the port by a small-time smuggler named Captain Riptide. Your mission is to infiltrate Riptide's private pier, recover the cargo, and silence the operation.

Progression

Begin the scenario with the 'The Dockmaster's Offer' Quest Card.

name: The Dockmaster's Offer
description:
Portmaster Kaelen, a nervous man in a crisp uniform, offers a hefty reward if you can recover the cargo. He knows Riptide's brutish second-in-command, Grok, has the coded map (manifest) to the ship.

Objective

Acquire the manifest from Grok by reducing his HP or SP to 0.

Progression

Begin a Timed Scene. Use the 'Grok's Lookout Post' Location Card for setup.

name: Grok's Lookout Post
description:
A dimly lit storage area overlooking the main warehouse floor. Grok, a massive Orc, sits alone near a crate containing a fragile-looking clockwork device (üîç at D4).

Setup

  • Map: 6x6 grid.
  • Enemy: Place 1 'Grok, the Simple Brute' at D3.
  • Players: Start at F3, F4.
  • **Terrain:** Crates at A1, A2, B1, C1, E1, F1 (Cover).

Disarm the Clockwork (D4)

An adjacent character can use an Action to Investigate the device. Roll+INT.
On a 16+: Grok is temporarily distracted. The character gains advantage on their next attack roll against him this scene.
Peril (1-8): The device explodes. All creatures in the scene take 1d6 MD fire damage.

Progression

Once Grok's HP or SP is reduced to 0, read the **'Manifest (Social Loss)'** text on his card. The next step is the **'The Warehouse Maze'** Quest Card.

name: Grok, the Simple Brute
description:
A massive, but simple-minded Orc, easily confused but incredibly tough. He is carrying the manifest.

Smash**Active** (Melee) Melee attack dealing HD+2 damage.
Parley (SD)**Active** (Social) Attempts to shut down conversation and intimidate target.
Steel Self (SP)**Active** (Self) Heals 1d6 SP.
Manifest (Loss)**Passive** When Grok's SP reaches 0, he becomes confused, loudly stating, "The Captain's ship is at Pier 13, loaded with the Salt-Cured Dragon Meat!" This reveals the next location.
Thick Hide**Passive** All HD damage taken is reduced by 1.

Combat AI (Very Low INT)

Grok uses his social actions to defend his low intelligence, but resorts to brute force when mentally or physically cornered.

  1. **Step 1: Determine Target:** The enemy who dealt the most **total damage (HP+SP)** to him in the previous turn. If ties, prioritize the closest enemy.
  2. **Step 2: Determine Action:**
    • If **HP < 15** (less than half HP): Use **Smash** on the target.
    • If **SP < 10**: Use **Steel Self** (Heal 1d6 SP).
    • If **SP damage > 0** in previous turn: Use **Parley** (SD) on the target.
    • Otherwise: Use **Smash** on the closest enemy.
  3. **Step 3: Movement:** Moves up to his SPEED (5) to achieve **melee adjacency** to the target. Follows the **INT -1 or lower** General Movement AI rule (moves through Difficult Terrain).

name: The Warehouse Maze
description:
Following Grok's forced confession, you move to Pier 13. To reach the ship, you must traverse a labyrinthine warehouse patrolled by Riptide's forces.

Objective

Reach the exit (Row 10) of the warehouse without losing any party members.

Progression

Begin a Timed Scene. Use the 'Crate Labyrinth' Location Card for setup. When the scene ends (by exiting or defeating all enemies), proceed to the 'The Smuggler's Yacht' Quest Card.

name: Crate Labyrinth
description:
A tight, 10x10 space cluttered with towering stacks of wooden crates. The crates provide cover and create difficult terrain.

Setup

  • Map: 10x10 grid (A-J rows, 1-10 columns).
  • Terrain: Squares (B2-D2), (G3-H5), (C7-E9) are **Crate Piles** (Difficult Terrain & Cover).
  • Enemies: Place 1 'Dock Guard' at D5. Place 1 'Smuggler Thug' at H8. Place 1 'Smuggler Thug' at A9.
  • Players: Start on any square in Row 1.
  • Exit: The area is cleared once a character reaches any square in Row 10.

name: Dock Guard
description:
A hardened city watchman, clad in standard-issue iron armor and carrying a rusty longsword.

Longsword**Active** (Melee) Melee attack that deals HD damage.
Armor**Passive** Has a permanent +1 Armor.

Combat AI (Low INT)

The Guard is simple and direct, always prioritizing melee engagement.

  1. **Step 1: Determine Target:** The **closest enemy**.
  2. **Step 2: Determine Action:** Use **Longsword** attack.
  3. **Step 3: Movement:** Moves up to its SPEED (6) to achieve **melee adjacency** to the target. Follows the **INT -1 or lower** General Movement AI rule (moves through Difficult Terrain).

name: Smuggler Thug
description:
A wiry rogue in dark leathers, wielding a pair of short daggers and moving with predatory caution.

Backstab**Active** (Melee) Deals HD+2 damage. Must be adjacent to another ally or hidden.
Throwing Knife**Active** (Range 4) Ranged attack that deals HD damage.
Disengage**Active, Cost 1 SP** Allows the Thug to move up to their SPEED without provoking attacks of opportunity.

Combat AI (Medium INT)

The Thug prefers opportunism and hit-and-run tactics, leveraging allies or distance.

  1. **Step 1: Determine Target:** The enemy with the **lowest current HP**.
  2. **Step 2: Determine Action:**
    • If the Thug is adjacent to the Target AND the Target is adjacent to an ally: Use **Backstab** (HD+2 damage).
    • If the Thug is adjacent to a high HP enemy, AND SP is available: Use **Disengage** (Cost 1 SP). If used, proceed directly to Step 3 Movement and perform the action in the new square.
    • If the Target is within **Throwing Knife range (4)**: Use **Throwing Knife**.
    • Otherwise: Use a basic melee attack.
  3. **Step 3: Movement:** Moves up to its SPEED (7). Follows the **INT 0** General Movement AI rule. It prioritizes moving to a square that places it either in a flanking position (adjacent to an ally) or a safe ranged position (within range 4).

name: The Smuggler's Yacht
description:
You emerge from the warehouse onto Pier 13. The smuggling ship, a sleek yacht named 'The Sea Serpent', is just ahead. Captain Riptide, a fierce Naga Spell-Serpent, stands ready with a large, glowing chest. This is the final battle.

Objective

Defeat Captain Riptide and secure the cargo chest.

Progression

Begin a Timed Scene. Use the 'The Sea Serpent's Deck' Location Card for setup.

name: The Sea Serpent's Deck
description:
A cramped, 10x8 ship deck. The entire perimeter (Row 1 and Row 8, Column A and Column J) is deep water (Hazard). A single, heavy, glowing cargo chest sits at the aft (H4).

Setup

  • Map: 10x8 grid (A-J columns, 1-8 rows).
  • Enemies: Place 1 **Captain Riptide** (Boss) at F4. Place 2 **Smuggler Thugs** at D3 and H3.
  • Players: Start on any square in Row 8.
  • **Hazard:** Any creature Pushed or Pulled into the deep water (A, J, 1, 8) takes 1d6 MD (water) and is immediately Slowed for 1 round. Squares on the water perimeter are treated as **Difficult Terrain** (requires 2 movement to enter).

Progression

Upon defeating the boss, proceed to the 'Reward of the Tides' Event Card.

name: Captain Riptide
description:
A proud, four-armed Naga whose lower body is a massive serpent's tail. She wields a trident and powerful water magic.

Trident Bash**Active** (Melee) Melee attack that deals HD damage.
Tidal Lash**Active, Costs 2 MP** (Cone 4) Unleashes a wave in a 4-square cone. All targets take 1d6 MD water damage and are **Pushed 1**.
Water Gun**Active, Costs 1 MP** (Range 6) Ranged attack that deals MD water damage. Can target self for healing.
Armor**Passive** Has a permanent +2 Armor.

Combat AI (High INT)

Riptide is a tactical caster who favors crowd control (Push) and self-preservation (Heal).

  1. **Step 1: Determine Target:** Target A: The closest enemy near a deep water hazard (A, J, 1, 8). Target B: The ally currently holding the most crystals (most dangerous caster/healer).
  2. **Step 2: Determine Action:**
    • If **HP is below 17** (50% HP) AND MP is available: Use **Water Gun** (Cost 1 MP) on herself (Heal).
    • If Target A is adjacent AND MP is available: Use **Tidal Lash** (Cost 2 MP) to try to Push them into the hazard.
    • If Target B is within **Water Gun range (6)**: Use **Water Gun** on Target B.
    • Otherwise: Use **Trident Bash** on the closest enemy.
  3. **Step 3: Movement:** Moves up to her SPEED (6). Follows the **INT +1 or higher** General Movement AI rule. She moves to a square that places a high-value enemy near a hazard or maintains a safe distance from melee threats (4-6 squares).

name: Reward of the Tides
description:
With Captain Riptide defeated, the valuable alchemical cargo is recovered. A quick search of her quarters yields a magnificent prize.

Reward

The party receives **150 gold** and **10 XP** each. The character who dealt the killing blow to Riptide acquires the **Naga's Finblade** rare item.

Scenario Complete

The session ends. Proceed to the Post-Session Phase (Downtime & Progression).

name: Naga's Finblade
description:
A shortsword whose blade shimmers like frozen seawater, granting unnatural speed in the water and on land. Range: Melee (1 square).

Tidal Quickness

(Passive)

Your base SPEED is permanently increased by 1. While in a water environment (GM's discretion), your SPEED is doubled.

Riptide Strike

When you deal HD with this weapon, you can spend 1 MP to push the target 1 square away from you.
